name: Party.IO: Gangster Fighting
description:
Party.IO : Gangster Fighting Game is an amazing party game where you have to fight with your other party members and have to survive till the end.

In this party.IO game you are at the party location with other gangsters. And then suddenly all the gangsters noodleman starts fighting. The task of each noodleman is to pick and throw other gang members from the stage. Each time you throw someone from the stage you will grow bigger in size and will have more ability to lift other players.

In this way the last man standing will win the game. So enjoy this new type of battle royal game and show your mad fighting skills.
